title: Bronze chandelier originallyfound at Al-Azhar Mosque now at at the Arab Museum (Islamic Museum in Cairo)
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Photographer's description: Musée Arabe. Salle No. 5. Lustre en tole laiton provenant de la mosquée el-Azhar. Translation of photographer's description: Arab Museum Hall No. 5 Chandelier originating from al-Azhar mosque.
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
source: From: Bronze chandelier originallyfound at Al-Azhar Mosque now at at the Arab Museum (Islamic Museum in Cairo)
